segments.text: This scene in the kitchen feels so ordinary at first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman in her apron is polishing that dish nicely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight from the window makes everything look bright.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But oh no, the sink is flooding over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's pouring down the cabinets; what a mess that's going to be.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her shoe's soaked, and she just keeps drying away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she's oblivious to the puddle spreading.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the boy is climbing on that shaky stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's grabbing cookies from the jar up high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's tilting back; it's dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The little girl is reaching up, excited for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They'll slip on that wet floor if they're not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside seems so calm compared to this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
